alert.note: Alert for Blount (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 22 at 6:21PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Blount, Fayette, Lamar, Marion, Walker and Winston. * WHEN...Through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An additional 1 to 2 inches, with locally higher amounts, will be possible. These amounts are in additional to the 2 to 4 inches received the past several days. Heavy rain on saturated grounds may produce flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
